verses.verse: Whence Come <WG4159> Wars <WG4171> And <WG2532> Fightings <WG3163> Among <WG1722> You? <WG5213> It Is Not <WG3756> Thence, <WG1782> From <WG1537> <WG3588> <WG2237> Your Pleasures, <WG5216> Which <WG3588> War <WG4754> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG3196> Your Members? <WG5216>

Ye Desire, <WG1937> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Have Not; <WG2192> Ye Kill <WG5407> And <WG2532> Are Emulous, <WG2206> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Are Not Able <WG1410> To Obtain; <WG2013> Ye Fight <WG3164> And <WG2532> War, <WG4170> <WG3756> Ye Have Not <WG2192>, But <WG1161> Because <WG1223> <WG3588> Not <WG3361> Ask <WG154> You <WG5209>

Ye Ask, <WG154> And <WG2532> <WG3756> Receive Not, <WG2983> Because <WG1360> Evilly <WG2560> Ye Ask <WG154> That <WG2443> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG2237> Your Pleasures <WG5216> Ye May Spend It. <WG1159>

Adulterers <WG3432> And <WG2532> Adulteresses, <WG3428> <WG3756> Know Ye Not <WG1492> That <WG3754> The <WG3588> Friendship <WG5373> Of The <WG3588> World <WG2889> Enmity With <WG2189> <WG3588> God <WG2316> Is? <WG2076> <WG3739> Whosoever <WG302> Therefore <WG3767> Be Minded <WG1014> A Friend <WG5384> To Be <WG1511> Of The <WG3588> World, <WG2889> An Enemy <WG2190> <WG3588> Of God <WG2316> Is Constituted. <WG2525>

Or <WG2228> Think Ye <WG1380> That <WG3754> In Vain <WG2761> The <WG3588> Scripture <WG1124> Speaks? <WG3004> With <WG4314> Envy <WG5355> Does Long <WG1971> The <WG3588> Spirit <WG4151> Which <WG3739> Took Up His Abode <WG2730> In <WG1722> Us? <WG2254>

<WG3173> But Greater <WG1161> He Gives <WG1325> Grace. <WG5485> Wherefore <WG1352> He Says, <WG3004> <WG3588> God <WG2316> The Proud <WG5244> Sets Himself Against, <WG498> <WG5011> But To The Lowly <WG1161> He Gives <WG1325> Grace. <WG5485>
Subject Yourselves <WG5293> Therefore <WG3767> <WG3588> To God. <WG2316> Resist <WG436> The <WG3588> Devil, <WG1228> And <WG2532> He Will Flee <WG5343> ' From <WG575> You. <WG5216>

Draw Near <WG1448> <WG3588> To God, <WG2316> And <WG2532> He Will Draw Near <WG1448> To You. <WG5213> Have Cleansed <WG2511> Your Hands, <WG5495> Sinners, <WG268> And <WG2532> Have Purified <WG48> Your Hearts, <WG2588> Ye Double Minded. <WG1374>

Be Wretched, <WG5003> And <WG2532> Mourn, <WG3996> And <WG2532> Weep. <WG2799> <WG3588> <WG1071> Your Laughter <WG5216> To <WG1519> Mourning <WG3997> Let Be Turned, <WG3344> And <WG2532> <WG3588> Your Joy <WG5479> To <WG1519> Heaviness. <WG2726>
Humble Yourselves <WG5013> Before <WG1799> The <WG3588> Lord, <WG2962> And <WG2532> He Will Exalt <WG5312> You. <WG5209>

<WG3361> Speak Not Against <WG2635> One Another, <WG240> Brethren. <WG80> He That <WG3588> Speaks Against <WG2635> His Brother, <WG80> And <WG2532> Judges <WG2919> <WG3588> <WG80> His Brother, <WG846> Speaks Against The <WG2635> Law, <WG3551> And <WG2532> Judges The <WG2919> Law. <WG3551> <WG1487> But If The <WG1161> Law <WG3551> Thou Judgest, <WG2919> Not <WG3756> Thou Art <WG1488> A Doer <WG4163> Of The Law, <WG3551> But <WG235> A Judge. <WG2923>

One <WG1520> Is <WG2076> The <WG3588> Lawgiver, <WG3550> Who <WG3588> Is Able <WG1410> To Save <WG4982> And <WG2532> To Destroy : <WG622> Thou <WG4771> Who <WG5101> Art <WG1488> That <WG3739> Judgest <WG2919> The <WG3588> Other? <WG2087>

Go To <WG71> Now, <WG3568> Ye Who <WG3588> Say, <WG3004> Today <WG4594> And <WG2532> Tomorrow <WG839> We May Go <WG4198> Into <WG1519> <WG3592> <WG3588> Such A City <WG4172> And <WG2532> May Spend <WG4160> There <WG1563> Year <WG1763> One <WG1520> And <WG2532> May Traffic, <WG1710> And <WG2532> May Make Gain, <WG2770>

Ye Who <WG3748> Not <WG3756> Know <WG1987> What <WG3588> On The <WG3588> Morrow Will Be, <WG839> <WG4169> For What Is <WG1063> <WG3588> <WG2222> Your Life? <WG5216> A Vapour <WG822> Even <WG1063> It Is, <WG2076> Which <WG3588> For <WG4314> A Little While <WG3641> Appears, <WG5316> Then <WG1899> And <WG1161> Disappears, <WG853>

Instead Of <WG473> <WG3588> <WG3004> Your Saying, <WG5209> If <WG1437> The <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Should Will <WG2309> And <WG2532> We Should Live, <WG2198> Also <WG2532> We May Do <WG4160> This <WG5124> Or <WG2228> That. <WG1565>
<WG3568> But Now <WG1161> Ye Boast <WG2744> In <WG1722> <WG3588> <WG212> Your Vauntings : <WG5216> All <WG3956> Boasting <WG2746> Such <WG5108> Evil <WG4190> Is. <WG2076>
To Him Knowing <WG1492> Therefore <WG3767> Good <WG2570> To Do, <WG4160> And <WG2532> Not <WG3361> Doing It, <WG4160> Sin <WG266> To Him <WG846> It Is. <WG2076>
